section.name: User Guide
section.span: How to work as a user of Hippo CMS.
section.p: Hippo CMS is designed to allow people to perform their tasks using skills actually related to that task. Therefore, the user guide is strictly divided into four user roles. Users only require the skills that belong to the role they will perform.
Before starting a guide, you may first want to learn how to manipulate the screenshots, making them large (double click), or showing only the relevant part (single click).

tr.td: Guide for Hippo CMS users to perform the role of contributor. (author and supplier of images and such)
Guide for Hippo CMS users to perform the role of editor (reviewer, decides when ready for publication).
Guide for Hippo CMS users to perform the role of Information Architect (creator of document templates/types, i.e. the informational structure, conform the business rules of the organisation).
Guide for Hippo CMS users to perform the role of CMS administrator (assigns rights to contributors, editors and information architects according to management decisions).
